means: <美>牛栏，<口>大房间（尤指候审犯人用的），候补队员区

sentence.Network_en: The team's bullpen is solid this year.
sentence.Network_cn: 今年该队的候补投手实力不错。

sentence.Network_en: The Yankees bullpen is also better than in recent years.
sentence.Network_cn: 洋基牛棚也是近年来表现最好的.

sentence.Network_en: Mike Mussina , who skipped a start yesterday, threw a bullpen session Friday.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天跳过先发的穆帅, 星期五已经开始在牛棚练投.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 牛棚（bullpen）(Bullpen)，是棒球场中投手上场前暖身的区域,也被引申用来指称队上的后援投手群。【简介与由来】 该词来自于美国职棒大联盟…
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(B4) - 商务英语词汇 ... bullionist 金银通货主义者 bullpen 牛栏 bullshit 胡说.
拳击术语 - 豆丁网 ... bruiser 职业拳击家 32 bullpen 拳击比赛场子 33 button 下颌要害部位 34.

list.abs: The Yankees bullpen also better than in recent years ., 洋基牛棚也是近年来表现最好的.
the bullpen has the same ranking , thanks to athat has caused Yankee relievers to work 2132 / 3 innings , second most in the league .他们的牛棚也有差不多的等级，这可要多谢先发们，让洋基的后援投手到目前为止投了2132/3局，全联盟中排行第二。
" We walked right into the bullpen , " he said later ., " 我们一直走到牛棚 " , 他稍后说.

means.word_mean: 1. a place on a baseball field where relief pitchers can warm up during a game
2. a large cell where prisoners (people awaiting trial or sentence or refugees or illegal immigrants) are confined together temporarily
